home.subtitle: A new online service for the Wii.
home.beta: This site is in BETA, rate it!
home.info:
<0><1>Wii<2>Link resurrects many region exclusive channels.
Including channels only released in Japan!
home.faqres1: WiiLink is the only service to bring back Japanese exclusive Wii channels after they were officially shut down. We've made Wii no Ma, the Demae Channel, and Digicam Print Channel functional once more. With our service, you can experience all of these once more on your Nintendo Wii - possibly for the first time.
home.faqres2: Without a replacement service for these channels, they would be lost to time, never to be seen again. However, thanks to our work, future generations of players can experience these channels again!
home.faqres3: Absolutely. We develop all of our channels without copyrighted code and material, and rely solely on what is provided within the channel and public knowledge. All code is written from the ground up. You will have no legal trouble from using our service.
home.faq4: Can the Demae Channel order real food?
home.morefaq: Any other questions? If so, be sure to read our full FAQ!
home.teamdef: Some of the incredible people who help bring WiiLink to life!
home.newsdef: Catch up on the latest news of the service!

blog.rss: Bring Wii News anywhere with our RSS Feed!

donate.title: Keep the groove going!
donate.desc: Keep up to date on all things WiiLink in our Discord server!

footer.desc: WiiLink is a revival service for the now-defunct Japanese exclusive Wii channels and media channels. This service allows you to use Wii Room, Digicam Print Channel, Kirby TV Channel, and the Food Channel!

services.itn1desc: Watch new videos with Wii Room, a unique take on video on-demand.
services.itn2desc: Create perfect prints with the Digicam Print Channel and design photo albums in a way only you do best.
services.itn3desc: Watch the original Kirby anime right from your Wii with the Kirby TV Channel.
services.itn4desc: Order food with the Food Channel and bring tasty goodness straight to your house
services.itn5desc: Check the weather right on your Wii, and plan your attire in accordingly.
services.itn6desc: Watch all sorts of trailers, promos, and shows all from one interface.
services.itn7desc: Want to know what's playin' on TV? Wonder no more with the TV Guide Channel!

status.coredesc: Services core to WiiLink, originally only available within Japan.
status.wc24desc: Functionality provided by WiiConnect24, revived by WiiLink.
status.videodesc: A myriad of services for you to best enjoy video within.
